text: "Young Guns (Go for It)" (sometimes called "Young Guns (Go for It!)") is a 1982 song by English pop duo Wham! and is the second song from their debut studio album Fantastic. It went to number 1 in Sweden, number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Australia and New Zealand, number 8 in Belgium, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 10 in Norway, number 11 in Finland, number 20 in Germany and did not chart in the United States. The song was Wham!'s first hit, reached with some help from the BBC music programme Top of the Pops. == Track listing == * "Going for It" is an instrumental version of "Young Guns (Go for It)" Category:1982 songs Category:Wham! songs
title: Young Guns (Go for It)
